item.title: Vocateur
item.description: Ha @ [[authors/jo walton|Jo Walton]] describing herself as a vocateur reader on the Ex Urbe Ad Astra podcast! Totally fits because as much as I love her as an author ([[books/lent|Lent]]! [[books/among others|Among Others]]!), I always say Jo is my favorite reader. I was trying to find out if [[authors/ada palmer|Ada Palmer]] coined vocateur in the [[series/terra ignota|Terra Ignota]] series, and the results of just a cursory google search all give her credit for the term.
